Key Match Events: Ben Stokes scored the winning run for England
Shaheen Afridi took a catch but injured himself in the process
Harry Brook was dismissed but called for help and returned to the field
Post-Match Reflections: England are now the first men's team to hold the T20 and ODI World Cups simultaneously
Sam Curran was named the player of the match and the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Melbourne Cricket Ground
Jos Buttler and Alex Hales were dismissed in the powerplay
Others: Adil Rashid took two wickets and conceded 22 runs
Moeen Ali scored 19 off 12 before falling with the finish line six runs away
